extended_output_schema.name: LocaleName
extended_output_schema.label: Locale name
extended_output_schema.hint: The user's language locale code. One of the Supported Locales. Example: United States English is en_US.

extended_output_schema.name: Active
extended_output_schema.label: Active
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is currently active. Format: Y/N.

extended_output_schema.name: CtrySubCode
extended_output_schema.label: Ctry sub code
extended_output_schema.hint: The users two-digit country code and two-digit state or province code. Example: Washington State, United States is US-WA.

extended_output_schema.label: Expense user
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user has access to Expense.

toggle_field.hint: Whether the user has access to Expense. Format: Y/N

extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is an Expense approver.

toggle_field.hint: Whether the user is an Expense approver. Format: Y/N

extended_output_schema.name: TripUser
extended_output_schema.label: Trip user
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is an trip user.

toggle_field.name: TripUser
toggle_field.hint: Whether the user is an trip user. Format: Y/N

extended_output_schema.name: InvoiceUser
extended_output_schema.label: Invoice user
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is an Expense approver.

toggle_field.name: InvoiceUser
toggle_field.hint: Whether the user is an Expense approver. Format: Y/N

extended_output_schema.name: InvoiceApprover
extended_output_schema.label: Invoice approver
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is an invoice approver.

toggle_field.name: InvoiceApprover
toggle_field.hint: Whether the user is an invoice approver. Format: Y/N

extended_output_schema.name: IsTestEmp
extended_output_schema.label: Is test emp
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether the user is an test user.

toggle_field.hint: Whether the user is an test user. Format: Y/N
